sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukraine readies what it says are the most effective military units tasked with shooting down Russian drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: As the war rages on in Ukraine, Russia has taken over the presidency of the UN Security Council.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I'm still alive, Pope Francis quips as he's discharged from the Rome hospital where he was being treated for bronchitis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: One of the most effective military units tasked with shooting down Russian drones as Moscow's invasion of Ukraine continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: continues. That's how officials in Kyiv are describing an experienced squad who are using off-road vehicles equipped with machine guns and shoulder-fired missiles to defend their territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: These troops have been put into teams of four and are on a tight schedule.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They typically receive a warning of an incoming drone just 15 minutes before it's due to land.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile Russian Defence Chief Sergei Shaigu has promised to provide invading forces with more high-precision weapons. This after his ministry released footage of what it described as su-25 ground attack aircraft which are being used in targeted attacks on military facilities and equipment in Ukraine. They claim camouflaged fortified field positions and armoured vehicles were destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: As the war rages on in Ukraine, Russia has taken over the presidency of the UN Security Council. The UN Security Council has 15 members and each member has one vote.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Under the Charter of the United Nations, all member states are obliged to comply with council decisions. Each member takes turns being president and it's rotated each month in alphabetical order, according to the English language. The last time Russia held the presidency was February last year the month it launched a full-scale invasion of its neighbor Ukraine on February the 23rd almost one year to the day since Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine the UN General Assembly demanded Russia's immediate withdrawal from the country in line with the UN Charter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis has been discharged from the Rome hospital where he was treated for bronchitis, quipping to journalists before being driven away, I'm still alive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Francis was admitted to the Gemelli Polyclinic on Wednesday after suffering breathing difficulties. Before departing, he hugged a couple whose daughter had died on Friday night at the hospital. Francis is expected to be in St. Peter's Square for Palm Sunday Mass.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: in St. Peter's Square for Palm Sunday Mass.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A series of avalanches have claimed the lives of four people in northern Norway,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: including one Slovakian and an Italian national.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Strong winds and huge amounts of snow continue to fall while authorities have urged locals in the Nordland, Troms and Finnmark regions to evacuate their homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Police say there is a high risk of landslides in these areas and have warned travellers to stay away.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Expert skiers have been advised to only use certified guides.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A barn was also destroyed and 140 goats were swept into the sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Officials in Spain have branded suspected arsonists as fire terrorists after more than 100 wildfires broke out in the Asturias region in the north of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Pedro SÃ¡nchez said culprits would be punished if arson does prove to be the cause.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Some 400 people have had to be evacuated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: be the cause. Some 400 people have had to be evacuated. In the eastern Valencia region, firefighters have been tackling another wildfire that's been burning for more than a week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At least 18 people have been killed after tornadoes ripped through six US states, including Arkansas and Illinois. A monster storm system spawned the deadly tornadoes, causing the collapse of a concert hall near a heavy metal event in Belvedere, Illinois.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A state of emergency has been declared in Little Rock, where a small shopping center was shredded and several homes, businesses and cars destroyed.
